case.title: dwf for dwm over 55 not over 60 - 55 (NY)
case.text: lets see how many read this correctly...so far there hasn't been any......looking for that divorced gentleman with children (a common ground) . please do not smoke or do drugs some social drinking is ok. im in my 50's do not be over 60 please be over 5' 10 and over 200 pounds please . please be in the NYC or Long Island NOT NJ NOT UPSTATE OR WESTCHESTER area . let email and see how it goes. looking forward in hearing from you thanks.
